medical_history.chief_complaint: Painful oral lesions along with hoarseness, dysphagia, and odinophagia.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms developed over a 6-month period, with an involuntary weight loss of approximately 4 kg. There was no fever or cough.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Previously treated laryngeal squamous cell carcinoma with partial laryngectomy and local radiotherapy for which there has been no relapse.
medical_history.social_history: Travelled to Cameroon and Ivory Coast for an 8-year professional expatriation stay 30 years before presentation; denied travel outside of France in the last 20 years.
